alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 11 at 1:15PM MST until December 12 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches above 2,500 feet, including Whitebird Hill. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches below 2,500 feet. * WHERE...Lower Hells Canyon/Salmon River Region. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Untreated surfaces will become icy Sunday night.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region
